players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and found out she's the mafioso. We should vote for her."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a bold claim to make so early. Bob was killed last night, and you're immediately pointing fingers at Alice. What makes you so sure about your investigation?"
Charlie: "Diana, your claim about Alice is very strong for day one. Bob was killed last night, and we don't have any other information. Are you sure about your investigation?"
Diana: "I stand by my investigation results. Alice is the mafioso, and we need to vote her out to protect the town."
You: "I don't think Diana's claim is reliable. She's jumping to conclusions without proof, and we should consider if she's trying to mislead us."
